    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Clue
    Crossword clues
    Crossword
    Manages Crossword Puzzle Game Handles grid, clues, and checks player input
    CrosswordGUI
    GUI for Crossword Puzzle game
    GameManager
    Manages the MiniPlay app as a whole.
    Grid
    2D grid used for games like Word Search and Crossword
    MainMenu
    Main menu GUI for MiniPlay Allows users to select game and exit
    MiniPlay
     
    TicTacToe
    Manages the Tic Tac Toe Game Handles the board, moves, and win/draw/lose
    tttGUI
    GUI for Tic Tac Toe game
    tttPlayer
    Handles player in Tic Tac Toe
    WordSearch
    Manages the Word Search game Handles the create of the puzzle grid and word list
    WordSearchGUI
    GUI for Word Search game
